verses.roman:
tomāre upadeśa kare, nā yāya sahana
ataeva tāre āmi kariye bhartsana

synonyms: tomāre—you; upadeśa kare—advises; nā yāya sahana—I cannot tolerate; ataeva—therefore; tāre—unto him; āmi—I; kariye—do; bhartsana—chastisement.
translation: "Jagā's advising you is intolerable for Me. Therefore I am chastising him.
